Package cbccore.sensors.digital.logic

Provides boolean algebra operations for digital (boolean) sensors.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AndBooleanSensor Applies a boolean AND operation to two parent IBooleanSensors
BivariateLogicBooleanSensor  
LogicBooleanSensor A LogicBooleanSensor allows an easy way for boolean operations to be applied on top of
NotBooleanSensor Applies a boolean NOT operation to a parent IBooleanSensor
OrBooleanSensor Applies a boolean OR operation to two parent IBooleanSensors
UnivariateLogicBooleanSensor  
XorBooleanSensor Applies a boolean XOR operation to two parent IBooleanSensors
 

Package cbccore.sensors.digital.logic Description

Provides boolean algebra operations for digital (boolean) sensors. Each implimenter of LogicBooleanSensor is both a wrapper for and a IBooleanSensor, making them stackable.

For example:
IBooleanSensor myModifiedSensor = new NotBooleanSensor(new AndBooleanSensor(sensorOne, sensorTwo));
